TopicTitle: (WIP)Bigger is better mod. (Stock part cfg's edited)

Articles.Content:
This mod is stock parts made bigger.

Currently contains;

Large 2.5m quadcoupler

Large " tri "

Large " bi "

Large Radial Air intake

Large 2.5m ASAS

Large Avionics

Large Circular intake

Large Rockomax decoupler

Large Skipper

Large Jumbo 64

Large FLT-800

Large Basic jet engine

Large Small Gear Bay

Large Solid Booster

Large Liquid Booster

Liquid Booster

Large Mainsail

Large LVT-45

Large Poodle

Large Mk1 Cockpit

Large Mk2 Cockpit

Large Mk3 Cockpit

Large Mk1 Fuselage

Large Mk2 Fuselage

Large Mk3 Fuselage

Large Mk3-2 adapter

Large Mk2-1 adapter

2 Large Radial decouplers (cant remember the names)

Large 24-77

Large radial engine(also cant remember name)

Large RAM air intake

Large Bicoupler

Large tri "

Large quad "

Large Hubmax

Large 2x2 panel

Super Large 2x2 panel

Will have pics soon, comments, feedback, ideas in the comments please, i would love to hear what people think.

Edited October 12, 2013 by Fitzy3
So, I guess these are balanced resizes, amirite? I love balanced resizes.

So, I guess these are balanced resizes, amirite? I love balanced resizes.

Yes, there is. If u want to help pm me, and i will send u link to download, so u can download it and have a look.

I wanted to do that first but my puter cant handle blender or unity(windows xp), so thats why i just rescaled parts.

And heres why it doesn't work. .20 and .21 broke rescalefactor in part files. so know i would have to import the model into unity at the scale i want, then export it. As mentioned above my puter cant handle modelling programs.

IF ANYONE can help me i would be extremely grateful.

rescaleFactor isn't broken, as far as I know. I mean, I'm using it, and it's working fine.

You just have to be careful if you're using MODEL nodes with non-1.0 scales.
